channel.title: Diablo III Official Game Site
channel.description: Diablo III is a genre-defining action-RPG set in Sanctuary, a world ravaged by the eternal conflict between angels and demons.

item.title: Diablo 3 PTR 2.7.2 | Now Live
item.content:encoded: Our two-week PTR testing period for the 2.7.2 update begins on November 4, and we're asking for your help to quell the tides of surging demons.

item.title: Play Diablo® II: Resurrected™ During the Early Access & Open Beta
item.content:encoded: Learn more about the Diablo II: Resurrected Early Access & Open Beta. Get all the details and answers to your most pressing questions about these upcoming tests!

item.title: Reimagining a legend: Behind Ethereal items in Season 24
item.content:encoded: Discover how the Diablo III team created this season’s theme and sought to pay homage to the lasting legacy of Diablo II.

item.title: Season 24 | Ethereal Memory | Now Live
item.content:encoded: Season 24 will begin on July 23! Read on to learn more about the Ethereals and new balance changes in Patch 2.7.1!

item.title: Diablo® II: Resurrected™: The Gates of Hell Open September 23
item.content:encoded: Diablo II: Resurrected™ is coming soon, a definitive remastering of Diablo II alongside its Lord of Destruction® expansion!

item.title: DIABLO III PTR 2.7.1 | Has Ended
item.content:encoded: Our two-week PTR testing period for the 2.7.1 update begins June 17, and we're asking for your help to quell the tides of surging demons.

item.title: DIABLO IMMORTAL CLOSED ALPHA — THE CRUSADE BEGINS
item.content:encoded: Learn more about the Diablo Immortal Closed Alpha. Get all the details and answers to your most pressing questions about the limited public Closed Alpha.

item.title: Diablo® II: Resurrected™ Technical Alpha — Experience the Legend
item.content:encoded: Learn more about the Diablo II: Resurrected Technical Alpha. Get all the details and answers to your most pressing questions about the limited public Technical Alpha.

item.title: Season 23 | The Disciples of Sanctuary | Has Ended!
item.content:encoded: Season 23 will begin on April 2! Read on to learn more about the Follower system revamp, leaderboard changes, and Legendary item changes in Patch 2.7.0!

item.title: Diablo 3 PTR 2.7.0 Has Ended
item.content:encoded: Our two-week PTR testing period for the 2.7.0 update begins February 25 and we're asking for your help to quell the tides of surging demons.

item.title: Diablo Deep Dive Panel Recap
item.content:encoded: Get caught up and dive deeper into all the latest news revolving around Diablo II: Resurrected, Diablo IV, and Diablo Immortal.
